title: Microwave Prayers
verse_text: Wait for the Lord; be strong and take heart and wait for the Lord.
insight: We live in a world of fast food and two-day shipping. But Psalm 27:14 teaches us that waiting on God is not wasted time - it’s preparation time.
God is not Amazon Prime. Prayer is not a vending machine. Waiting strengthens faith muscles we wouldn’t build any other way.
one_minute_win: Instead of asking, spend 1 minute today just saying: “Thank You, Lord.”
declaration: Patience is my strength, not my weakness.
related_devotionals: Isaiah 40:31 Devotional - Strength in the Waiting
